resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157423</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157423</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2415</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sounds of the Heart</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Töne des Inneren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bruits du coeur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sons do coração</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Suoni del cuore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήχοι της καρδιάς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sonidos del corazón</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Interactive animations of the heart which demonstrate heartbeat sounds, ECG graphs unser varying conditions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heart</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">human body</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive Animationen des Inneren, die 
Herzschlagtöne zeigen, ECG stellt unser unterschiedliche Zustände 
graphisch dar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les animations interactives du coeur qui 
démontrent des bruits de battement de coeur, ECG représente 
graphiquement des états variables d'unser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os animations interativos do coração que 
demonstram sons do heartbeat, ECG representam graficamente condições
variando do unser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le animazioni interattive del cuore che 
dimostrano i suoni di battito cardiaco, ECG rappresenta graficamente 
gli stati di variazione del unser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικές ζωτικότητες της καρδιάς που καταδεικνύουν 
τους ήχους κτύπου της καρδιάς, ποικίλοι όροι γραφικών 
παραστάσεων ECG unser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las animaciones interactivas del corazón que 
demuestran sonidos del latido del corazón, ECG representan 
condiciones que varían del unser gra'ficamente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Inneres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">menschlicher Körper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">coeur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">corps humain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">coração</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corpo humano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cuore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corpo umano</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καρδιά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανθρώπινο σώμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">corazón</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuerpo humano</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2415</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education
n:Israel Ministry of Education
org:Israel Ministry of Education
end:vcard</entity>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">8-18</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">8-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Blaufuss Medical Multimedia Laboratories</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>979</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">physiology</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>157423</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
